author: scottbw
msg: Removed database scripts as these are no longer needed. (This change wasn't picked up in the recent merge from the branch due to a mistake in my SVN configuration.)

author: stsp
msg: As part of work on issue #3620, improve input validation in 'svn merge'.
(do_merge, merge_locked, merge_peg_locked): Make sure that the merge
target exists, and require either two paths or two URLs as merge sources.
(svn_cl__merge): Require either two paths or two URLs as merge sources.
